title: Forgot my Thunderbird Email Password
content: My Thunderbird Email was on auto password sign in when I would boot up, a couple of days while in start up mode on my computer my area had a blackout. When the power supply returned my Thunderbird Email would not start up and requested my password which I have forgot as it is a while since I last used it. Could someone please advise how do I reset my password in Thunderbird... Thank You Derek

title: Multiple Gmail accounts on Tbird.
content: I have had two Gmail accounts on Tbird for about a year with no problems. Now I get unpredictable or no results trying to send or receive messages from the newer account. A message mentioning unsuccessful server authentification is the most common. "we have sent your message but not mentioned it in the "sent" folder due to connectivity problems" also occurs. I have absolutely no problem on iOS mail or Tbird running on MacOS. To the extent that I can decipher the iOS settings, there is no difference.

title: Thunderbird will not connect to Outlook mail after upgrading security OAuth
content:
Hi all, Microsoft required upgrading Outlook mail account to 2step authentication from normal password. I followed all the instructions after that to connect Thunderbird, both 1) Server setting and 2) Outgoing Server SMTP here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202

Since I did, Thunderbird will no longer connect and retrieve mail. It just hangs.

Is there a conflict as I am still using a POP Outlook account? Meaning do I need an IMAP setup? I'm really, really tech illiterate, so dumb it right down for me, please.

title: Jio-fiber-cancellation-customer -
content: To cancel your Jio AirFiber request, you typically need to contact Jio customer support either through their hotline O8252-3O1-6OO or online chat service. They will guide you through the cancellation process and may require some information from you to proceed with the cancellation.

title: poczta thunderbird nie pobiera poczty z wp
content:
Na komputerze mam zainstalowany wiele lat thunderbird , który jest skonfigurowany z pocztą wp. Cały czas było wszystko dobrze od 30 września zaczął się problem z pobieraniem poczty z wp natomiast wiadomości wysyła . Rozumiem tak to że ma problem z pop3. Komunikat jaki wyskakuje to

Logowanie na serwerze pop3.wp.pl za pomocą nazwy użytkownika angela608 się nie powiodło.

Cały czas było dobrze i nagle bez powodu wyskakuje taki problem. Proszę o pomoc w rozwiązaniu awarii

title: I WANT to enter my email password every session
content: I DON'T want my email account password to be saved anywhere in Thunderbird and I DO want to have to enter the password each time I start up Thunderbird anew. Where/how can I ensure I have to enter my hotmail password each time I start up Thunderbird please?

title: Aggiornamento a Ubuntu 24.04.1: Thunbird disinstallato (v. snap non funziona).

title: THUNDERBIRD SEEMS TO BE FALLING APART
content: I'm about to find a new mail client...now when I manually try to download my mail from ANY outlook server I get a certificate warning that when I try to get or make an exception since I've had these outlook email addresses for eternity, won't cooperate. it says "you are about to over ride how Thunderbird identifies this site. legitamate sites such as banks, stores or other public sites will not ask you to do this." then shows the location of outlook.office365.com:993 and says " this site attempts to identify itself with invalid information." then says "unknown identity" "the certificate id not trusted because it hasn't been verified as issued by a trusted authority using a secure signature" then asks if I want to permanently store this exception but when I click "confirm security exception" it apparently doesn't work because I still keep getting that message... Oh and I can go through a browser and Windows mail and they both work just fine. It's only through thunderbird I have these issues..help

title: Multiple email addresses using same password require multiple logins
content: I am using Firefox 130.0, 64 bit, with Duckduckgo search engine and TB 128.0.3. I have six email accounts with my Internet provider CTI. I use the same password to log into CTI. I select: "Enter your password for (account name) on mail.pa.net." I select: "Use Password Manager to remember this password." That one login activated all six of my accounts. Using earlier versions (V28) of TB, I logged into only one account on CTI and all six accounts activated and remained active until I logged out at the end of any session with CTI. Now the passwords must be entered individually for all six accounts and each account times out after a few minutes of inactivity, then I have to relogin for each account. What happened between V28 and V 130 to change that procedure and can I fix it? CTI explains they did not change anything on their end. Thank you, D. Gordon
creator: jerico46

title: ongevraagd nieuw profiel aangemaakt na installatie nieuwe versie Thunderbird

Hier heb ik niet om gevraagd, intussen weet ik hoe ik snel mijn oude profiel weer terug kan zetten. Ik heb bij de instellingen bij de updates ingesteld dat Thunderbird wel mag zoeken naar updates maar dat ik zelf kies of ik ze wil installeren.
